name: VGDC Driver's License Exam
description:
It's the final exam before you get your very own driver's license!!!... but something isn't right...

The traffic cones decide to strike back. Drift into the traffic cones and show them who is the superior being! But be careful, these traffic cones are the hazard.

Controls:

     Left/Right to turn

     Hold turn to drift

     Be careful not to burnout!

Assets:

m6x11 fontDaniel LinssenMusicAntti LuodeCar model/u/pickledseacat

Made as a part of a NC State's VGDC Game Jam - 'Traffic cones'
